post_title: Govt Planning to Turn Army Public School Peshawar Into A University
post_discription:
The federal government is mulling over granting Army Public School (APS), Warsak Road, Peshawar the status of a university and renaming it to Shuhada APS University.

post_title: Neymar seals Puma endorsement deal two weeks after leaving Nike
post_discription:
PARIS: Neymar has sealed an endorsement deal with Puma, the German company announced on Saturday, two weeks after the Brazilian superstar left his long-time sponsor Nike.
